Desc: Every store tastes good.
The Commercial Square's environment is getting better and better.
Great atmosphere, my kids really like it.
I'll come back. The desserts are excellent.
Meeting the Gray Raven Commandant makes my life complete!
The shops are all affordable and offer great value for money.
The store staff all have great attitudes.
The decor is very unique and looks amazing in photos.
You can test out CUBs here. Highly recommend.
The roads are nice and wide. Perfect for taking a stroll.
The environment could be better.
I hope they can build more snack shops.
Got sick after eating here! Avoid at all costs!
The lighting is too dim and the atmosphere isn't cozy enough.
The AC isn't working well. I'm dying from the heat.
A bit pricey. Not particularly good value for money.
The background music is too loud and makes it hard to chat.
Way too crowded during peak hour. Can't even get a table.
Too close to the Engineering Force construction site. So noisy.
Food delivery takes forever to arrive, so frustrating.
